items.title: Define project vision and objectives
items.summary: Establish the 'why' behind the project, strategic importance, and what success looks like

items.title: Define scope and deliverables
items.summary: Set project boundaries - what is included and excluded, expected outputs

items.title: Research architecture patterns
items.summary: Investigate suitable architecture patterns for the project requirements

items.title: Evaluate and select tech stack
items.summary: Research and choose technologies, frameworks, and tools for the project

items.title: Create initial architecture plan
items.summary: Design the system architecture, component structure, and key interfaces

items.title: Set up project scaffolding
items.summary: Create initial project structure, folder layout, and configuration files

items.title: Configure CI/CD pipeline
items.summary: Set up automated build, test, and deployment workflows

items.title: Set up test framework
items.summary: Configure testing tools and create initial test structure
